body: Can't reproduce locally with neither clang-12 nor clang-10, but ci fails :man_shrugging:

This should have been fixed by commit fa3cc0bfc4c4fc13a384fc291403c9fd41082f18

Location: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/590e49ccf2af27c6c1f1e0eb8be3a4bf4d92ce8b/src/test/main.cpp#L25
